data.event: The goose was discovered on February 25, 2008.
As a result of the finding, poultry movement has now been restricted by the Department for the Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (DEFRA) in the areas surrounding the swannery.

event.title: The removal of all birds, dead or alive from any property now

data.event: The removal of all birds, dead or alive from any property now requires a license.

event.title: will expire no earlier than 31 days

data.event: DEFRA says the restrictions will expire no earlier than 31 days.
